turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, could you order me a Black and White Mocha from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm heading to Asheville through Weaverville, NC, can you find me one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's a store close by inside of Ingles on Weaver Blvd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd rather stop by a drive through.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There's another location on Charlotte St. with a drive through.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok great, and what kind of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have coconut?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, and do you want any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The largest they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Venti is the largest. Is there anything else you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add another shot of esresso to that? That's all

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I'll add it in. Your final order is one venti black and white mocha with an extra shot of espresso. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. I will put the order in to be ready for pickup at the Starbucks on Charlotte St. in Asheville. Your receipt will be sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome, have a wonderful day.
